Name: Slighty Magical Crowbar
Description: Honestly not too sure about this. Seems like someone just slighty enchanted a metal crowbar they found on the floor. You should probably keep it. It loves you.

Name: Battered Tree Trunk
Description: A tree ripped from the Sylven plains. It has seen much use, perhaps banging against other foes. Termites bite and gnaw at the tree trunk making it quite fragile.
